Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Rug_Desert_Wolf-FlavorText", "Instantly transforms your shelter or cabin into an 18th century hunting lodge.")

Rows.Name: Item_Rug_Jaguar
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Rug_Jaguar-Description", "A decorative jaguar skin.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Rug_Jaguar-FlavorText", "Instantly transforms your shelter or cabin into an 18th century hunting lodge.")

Rows.Name: Item_Rug_PolarBear
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Rug_PolarBear-Description", "A decorative polar bear skin.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Rug_PolarBear-FlavorText", "Instantly transforms your shelter or cabin into an 18th century hunting lodge.")

Rows.Name: Item_Rug_Snow_Wolf
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Rug_Snow_Wolf-Description", "A decorative snow wolf skin.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Rug_Snow_Wolf-FlavorText", "Instantly transforms your shelter or cabin into an 18th century hunting lodge.")

Rows.Name: Item_Rug_SnowLeopard
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Rug_SnowLeopard-Description", "A decorative snow leopard skin.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Rug_SnowLeopard-FlavorText", "Instantly transforms your shelter or cabin into an 18th century hunting lodge.")

Rows.Name: Item_Rug_Weave_Thick
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Rug_Weave_Thick-Description", "A plainly woven, thick pile fiber mat.")

Rows.Name: Item_Rug_Weave_Thin
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Rug_Weave_Thin-Description", "A plainly woven fiber mat.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Rug_Weave_Thin-FlavorText", "Four trillion kilometers from home, these details can make all the difference.")

Rows.Name: Item_Trophy_Bench
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Trophy_Bench-Description", "Taxidermy tools and mounting equipment.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Trophy_Bench-FlavorText", "Make a record of your victories, because planet is barely aware of you.")

Rows.Name: Item_Deer_Trophy
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Deer_Trophy-Description", "A mounted stag head.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Deer_Trophy-FlavorText", "Evidence of skill, patience and accuracy.")

Rows.Name: Item_Bear_Trophy
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Bear_Trophy-Description", "A mounted grizzly head.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Bear_Trophy-FlavorText", "Until you step beyond the terrazone, few totems of survival speak louder than a grizzly\'s silent head.")

Rows.Name: Item_PolarBear_Trophy
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_PolarBear_Trophy-Description", "A mounted polar bear head.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_PolarBear_Trophy-FlavorText", "Greater challenges await beyond the terrazone, but here, there is no greater emblem of your eminence.")

Rows.Name: Item_Cougar_Trophy
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Cougar_Trophy-Description", "A mounted cougar head.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Cougar_Trophy-FlavorText", "This animal challenged, and lost.")

Rows.Name: Item_Jaguar_Trophy
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Jaguar_Trophy-Description", "A mounted jaguar head.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Jaguar_Trophy-FlavorText", "This animal challenged, and lost.")

Rows.Name: Item_Jaguar_Black_Trophy
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Jaguar_Black_Trophy-Description", "A mounted jaguar head.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Jaguar_Black_Trophy-FlavorText", "This animal challenged, and lost.")

Rows.Name: Item_Deer_Head
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Deer_Head-Description", "The head of a deer, can be crafted into a deployable trophy to hang on your wall.")

Rows.Name: Item_Bear_Head
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Bear_Head-Description", "The head of a bear, can be crafted into a deployable trophy to hang on your wall.")

Rows.Name: Item_PolarBear_Head
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_PolarBear_Head-Description", "The head of a polar bear, can be crafted into a deployable trophy to hang on your wall.")

Rows.Name: Item_Cougar_Head
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Cougar_Head-Description", "The head of a cougar, can be crafted into a deployable trophy to hang on your wall.")

Rows.Name: Item_Jaguar_Head
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Jaguar_Head-Description", "The head of a jaguar, can be crafted into a deployable trophy to hang on your wall.")

Rows.Name: Item_Jaguar_Black_Head
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Jaguar_Black_Head-Description", "The head of a jaguar, can be crafted into a deployable trophy to hang on your wall.")

Rows.Name: Item_Taxidermy_Knife
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Taxidermy_Knife-Description", "A small, strong precision cutting tool.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Taxidermy_Knife-FlavorText", "Perfect for precise cuts to preserve that \'still breathing\' look.")

Rows.Name: Item_Iron_Floor
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Iron_Floor-Description", "Lightweight but resilient sheet aluminium flooring.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Iron_Floor-FlavorText", "Able to be repaired with a repair hammer.")

Rows.Name: Item_Iron_Wall
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Iron_Wall-Description", "A lightweight corrugated aluminium wall")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Iron_Wall-FlavorText", "Cycle for other construction variants. Able to be repaired with a repair hammer.")

Rows.Name: Item_Iron_Wall_Angle
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Iron_Wall_Angle-Description", "A lightweight, corrugated aluminium gable. ")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Iron_Wall_Angle-FlavorText", "Able to be repaired with a repair hammer.")

Rows.Name: Item_Iron_Ramp
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Iron_Ramp-Description", "A lightweight sheet aluminium ramp or roofing sheet.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Iron_Ramp-FlavorText", "Able to be repaired with a repair hammer.")

Rows.Name: Item_Iron_Beam
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Iron_Beam-Description", "Anchors structures to the ground for higher building.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Iron_Beam-FlavorText", "Beams connect vertically and diagonally to support multi-level construction. Your HUD will indicate when beams are anchored with a blue cursor.")

Rows.Name: Item_Iron_Door
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Iron_Door-Description", "A rough but resilient corrugated aluminium door.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Iron_Door-FlavorText", "Able to be repaired with a repair hammer.")

Rows.Name: Item_Iron_TrapDoor
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Iron_TrapDoor-Description", "A simple aluminium door-in-the-floor.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Iron_TrapDoor-FlavorText", "Able to be repaired with a repair hammer.")

Rows.Name: Item_Iron_Window
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Iron_Window-Description", "A rough, wood-framed aluminium window.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Iron_Window-FlavorText", "Able to be repaired with a repair hammer.")

Rows.Name: Item_Iron_Floor_TrapDoor
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Iron_Floor_TrapDoor-Description", "Rough sheet aluminium flooring with an access hole.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Iron_Floor_TrapDoor-FlavorText", "Able to be repaired with a repair hammer.")

Rows.Name: Item_Iron_Stairs
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Iron_Stairs-Description", "Lightweight and durable aluminium stairs.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Iron_Stairs-FlavorText", "Able to be repaired with a repair hammer.")

Rows.Name: Item_Paste_Health_Regen
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Paste_Health_Regen-Description", "A herbal confection that speeds healing.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Paste_Health_Regen-FlavorText", "The lily\'s high concentration of bioactive ingredients is thought to inhibit the reuptake of certain cytochromes, briefly flooding your body with oxidating enzymes.")

Rows.Name: Item_Paste_Health_Buff
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Paste_Health_Buff-Description", "An organic preparation that temporarily increases health.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Paste_Health_Buff-FlavorText", "Like so many things on Icarus, the exact ingredients would probably render this concoction illegal on Earth.")

Rows.Name: Item_Paste_Health_Restore
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Paste_Health_Restore-Description", "An organic fusion that restores health.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Paste_Health_Restore-FlavorText", "The combination of Icarus\'s unique conditions and genetic adjustments to plant life has seen the addition of \'useful\' methyl chains to many previously innocuous plant-based preparations.")

Rows.Name: Item_Paste_Stamina_Regen
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Paste_Stamina_Regen-Description", "An organic stimulant that accelerates stamina recovery.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Paste_Stamina_Regen-FlavorText", "A herbal preparation that acts rapidly on the sympathetic nervous system, increasing noradrenergic activity.")

Rows.Name: Item_Paste_Stamina_Buff
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Paste_Stamina_Buff-Description", "A herbal concoction, temporarily increasing stamina.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Paste_Stamina_Buff-FlavorText", "While lacking some of the pharmaceutical refinements, this paste produces similar physiological affects to the \'wakers\' once offered to long haul space pilots.")

Rows.Name: Item_Paste_Stamina_Restore
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Paste_Stamina_Restore-Description", "A natural stimulant that restores lost stamina.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Paste_Stamina_Restore-FlavorText", "As countless athletes, party-goers and would-be mystics have noted, the line between natural stimulant and highly addictive narcotic is arbitrary, at best.")

Rows.Name: Item_Paste_Stamina_Consumption
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Paste_Stamina_Consumption-Description", "A biotic compound that slows stamina loss temporarily.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Paste_Stamina_Consumption-FlavorText", "The time-jarring effects of exotics find their influence in many subtle, poorly understood ways on Icarus.")

Rows.Name: Item_Paste_Oxygen_Buff
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Paste_Oxygen_Buff-Description", "A natural concoction that increases available oxygen.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Paste_Oxygen_Buff-FlavorText", "Your parents are a long way from here. What you do with your body is your business.")

Rows.Name: Item_Paste_Oxygen_Restore
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Paste_Oxygen_Restore-Description", "An organic co-factor that rapidly restores oxygen.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Paste_Oxygen_Restore-FlavorText", "\'Helper molecule\'")

Rows.Name: Item_Paste_Oxygen_Consumption
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Paste_Oxygen_Consumption-Description", "A natural beta blocker.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Paste_Oxygen_Consumption-FlavorText", "This preparation reduces the heart rate, dropping oxygen consumption temporarily.")

Rows.Name: Item_Paste_Food_Consumption
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Paste_Food_Consumption-Description", "An organic confection that arrests hunger for a limited time.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Paste_Food_Consumption-FlavorText", "Just because it\'s organic, doesn\'t mean it\'s good for you.")

Rows.Name: Item_Paste_Water_Consumption
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Paste_Water_Consumption-Description", "A natural preparation, temporarily reducing the body\'s need for water.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Paste_Water_Consumption-FlavorText", "The key word here is \'temporarily\'.")

Rows.Name: Item_Reinforced_TrapDoor
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Reinforced_TrapDoor-Description", "A braced and bolstered wooden trapdoor.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Reinforced_TrapDoor-FlavorText", "May be attached to a floorpiece with a trapdoor accessway.")

Rows.Name: Item_Concrete_TrapDoor
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Concrete_TrapDoor-Description", "A heavy duty trapdoor.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Concrete_TrapDoor-FlavorText", "May be attached to a floorpiece with a trapdoor accessway.")

Rows.Name: Item_IceBox
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_IceBox-Description", "Stores food at low temperatures when supplied with ice.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_IceBox-FlavorText", "The insulated icebox arrests food decay, as well as slowing the melting of ice itself. Has 10 storage slots.")

Rows.Name: Item_Bed_Interior_Wood
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Bed_Interior_Wood-Description", "Once placed in shelter, a bed can be set as a respawn location. Can also be used to sleep through the night.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Bed_Interior_Wood-FlavorText", "A solidly made, simple place to rest and restore energy")

Rows.Name: Item_Carcass_DeerLarge
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_DeerLarge-Description", "A genetically modified member of the cervid family.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_DeerLarge-FlavorText", "Modification of their respiratory system allows these deer variants to withstand - and thrive - despite Icarus\'s toxic atmosphere.")

Rows.Name: Item_Carcass_DesertDeer
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_DesertDeer-Description", "Imported from Earth, adjusted and released to the reformed deserts of Icarus.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_DesertDeer-FlavorText", "\'A hunter who is going to shoot an antelope does not waste his bullets on the dog.\' - Israelmore Ayivor")

Rows.Name: Item_Glass_Beam
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Glass_Beam-Description", "Anchors structures to the ground for higher building.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Glass_Beam-FlavorText", "Beams connect vertically and diagonally to support multi-level construction. Your HUD will indicate when beams are anchored with a blue cursor.")

Rows.Name: Item_Glass_Wall
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Glass_Wall-Description", "A fully transparent, mullioned wall section.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Glass_Wall-FlavorText", "Throw no stones, but hold \'R\' to cycle through variants, such as doorways. Mysteriously, can be repaired with a repair hammer.")

Rows.Name: Item_Glass_Wall_Angle
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Glass_Wall_Angle-Description", "Angular inserts for gables and other tilted designs.")

Rows.Name: Item_Glass_Ramp
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Glass_Ramp-Description", "A transparent roof piece or ramp.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Glass_Ramp-FlavorText", "Able to be repaired with a repair hammer.")

Rows.Name: Item_Glass_Door
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Glass_Door-Description", "A delicate door.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Glass_Door-FlavorText", "Please leave a review.")

Rows.Name: Item_Glass_Window
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Glass_Window-Description", "A single-pane glass window.")

Rows.Name: Item_Concrete_Window
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Concrete_Window-Description", "A heavy duty, highly durable window. ")

Rows.Name: Item_Corn
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Corn-Description", "A staple on several planets.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Corn-FlavorText", "Cook or cultivate this ancient cereal, humanity\'s most widely produced grain.")

Rows.Name: Item_Carcass_Desert_Wolf
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_Desert_Wolf-Description", "A savage pack hunter.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_Desert_Wolf-FlavorText", "Ever adaptable, the hyena endures where little else survives.")

Rows.Name: Item_Player_Gravestone
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Player_Gravestone-Description", "The body is all that remains.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Player_Gravestone-FlavorText", "The soul leaves the flesh and nothing is left except the mortal husk.")

Rows.Name: Item_Titanium_Knife
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Titanium_Knife-Description", "A blade as hard and lightweight as life itself.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Titanium_Knife-FlavorText", "Named for the Greek Titans, titanium is harder than steel, corrosion resistant and extremely light. Its only flaw is brittleness, meaning it falls short of its indestructible reputation.")

Rows.Name: Item_Titanium_Arrow
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Titanium_Arrow-Description", "An extremely light, strong projectile.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Titanium_Arrow-FlavorText", "Whether on Icarus or Earth, hunters continue to value skills for stealth, control and intimacy of the kill.")

Rows.Name: Item_Titanium_Spear
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Titanium_Spear-Description", "A powerful, precise combat weapon. ")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Titanium_Spear-FlavorText", "Extremely strong and lightweight, the titanium spear is a devastating hunting and protective tool in well-trained hands.")

Rows.Name: Item_Titanium_Sickle
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Titanium_Sickle-Description", "A resilient version of an antique design.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Titanium_Sickle-FlavorText", "Sharper and stronger, it swings further, delivering more resources with each swipe.")

Rows.Name: Item_Raw_Prime_Meat
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Raw_Prime_Meat-Description", "HIgh quality meat, though quick to spoil.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Raw_Prime_Meat-FlavorText", "The last word in Icarus cuisine, when properly cooked, though requires refrigeration soon after killing or will spoil.")

Rows.Name: Item_Cooked_Prime_Meat
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Cooked_Prime_Meat-Description", "Energy dense, high quality cut.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Cooked_Prime_Meat-FlavorText", "Cooked meat is easier to digest and provides more nutrition than raw flesh.")

Rows.Name: Item_Repair_Bench
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Repair_Bench-Description", "Repairs any item, requiring power to repair tier 4 or workshop items.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Repair_Bench-FlavorText", "A little duct tape, maybe some lubricant, this bench can fix anything!")

Rows.Name: Item_Carcass_DesertDeerLarge
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_DesertDeerLarge-Description", "A large, genetically modified ruminant.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_DesertDeerLarge-FlavorText", "Further from the savannah than anyone ever expected.")

Rows.Name: Item_WaterBomb
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_WaterBomb-Description", "A thrown device for fire fighting.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_WaterBomb-FlavorText", "Woven from fiber, the water bomb allows fire suppression from a safe distance.")

Rows.Name: Item_Coconut
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Coconut-Description", "Mostly water, young coconuts will quench thirst but won\'t do much for hunger.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Coconut-FlavorText", "Like sharks, coconuts often fail to live up to their lethal reputation.")

Rows.Name: Item_Coconut_Mid
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Coconut_Mid-Description", "A balance of light sustenance and moderate hydration, in a fibrous shell.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Coconut_Mid-FlavorText", "Ripe coconuts contain a balance of thirst-quenching liquid and energy-dense, hunger satisfying flesh.")

Rows.Name: Item_Coconut_Mature
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Coconut_Mature-Description", "Maturity diminishes liquid content, but offers more satisfying flesh.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Coconut_Mature-FlavorText", "A coconut\'s final stage is also its most energy-rich.")

Rows.Name: Item_Bandage_Heat
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Bandage_Heat-Description", "Cloth bandages impregnated with a warming salve, for treating frostbite.")

Rows.Name: Item_Poison_Arrow
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Poison_Arrow-Description", "Slow death, with a point.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Poison_Arrow-FlavorText", "Requiring less accuracy, but more patience, the poison arrow brings down quarry slowly, but surely.")

Rows.Name: Item_Poison_Paste
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Poison_Paste-Description", "A slow-working toxin made from spoiled meat. ")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Poison_Paste-FlavorText", "\'Life is a slow working poison\' - Jean Hurvit")

Rows.Name: Item_Anvil_Bench
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Anvil_Bench-Description", "Heavyweight work surface for iron and steel tools, using ingots smelted in their appropriate furnaces.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Anvil_Bench-FlavorText", "Arguably the simplest fabrication system known to humanity.")

Rows.Name: Item_Steel_Spear
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Steel_Spear-Description", "A light, strong traditional spear design that holds its edge.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Steel_Spear-FlavorText", "The word \'spear\' has descended to us through the ages largely unchanged.")

Rows.Name: Item_Steel_Axe
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Steel_Axe-Description", "A steel axe, for swifter felling and hewing.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Steel_Axe-FlavorText", "Steel of this quality would be an embarrassment to any industry on Earth, but on Icarus remains a minor miracle.")

Rows.Name: Item_Steel_Ingot
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Steel_Ingot-Description", "A medium-density ingot of carbon steel.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Steel_Ingot-FlavorText", "Stronger than iron, more elastic than rubber. Sometimes.")

Rows.Name: Item_Steel_Bloom
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Steel_Bloom-Description", "A precursor mixture of iron ore and coal, smelted in a concrete furnace to create steel.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Steel_Bloom-FlavorText", "The conditions on Icarus give its would-be metallurgists very little control over the finer details of steel smelting. A basic bloomery process prevails.")

Rows.Name: Item_Steel_Knife
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Steel_Knife-Description", "A tempered needlepoint hunting blade.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Steel_Knife-FlavorText", "Finely balanced knives like this can be thrown accurately with a little practice.")

Rows.Name: Item_Steel_Pickaxe
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Steel_Pickaxe-Description", "Tempered steel, suitable for even the toughest of metals.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Steel_Pickaxe-FlavorText", "When first landing on Icarus prospectors quickly discovered the need for stronger metals to deal with the local ore.")

Rows.Name: Item_Steel_Bolt
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Steel_Bolt-Description", "A hard-hitting steel bolt, trading distance for damage.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Steel_Bolt-FlavorText", "Roughly 64,000 years since its first invention, the essential form of the bolt remains unchanged.")

Rows.Name: Item_Carcass_Alpha_Wolf
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_Alpha_Wolf-Description", "A savage hunter.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_Alpha_Wolf-FlavorText", "The Formidable Alpha wolf variant endures where little else survives.")

Rows.Name: Item_Carcass_Alpha_Desert_Wolf
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_Alpha_Desert_Wolf-Description", "A savage hunter.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_Alpha_Desert_Wolf-FlavorText", "The Formidable Alpha wolf variant endures where little else survives.")

Rows.Name: Item_Carcass_Jaguar
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_Jaguar-Description", "The second most dangerous thing in the forest")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_Jaguar-FlavorText", "Introduced to manage the population of smaller mammals, the jaguar variant adopted swiftly to the arid regions of the new Icarus.")

Rows.Name: Item_Suture_Kit
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Suture_Kit-Description", "A basic medical kit for healing deep wounds.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Suture_Kit-FlavorText", "Whether lightly or deeply wounded, \'Permit the pain to pass over you, and through you.\' - Bao Li Wei")

Rows.Name: Item_Antipoison
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Antipoison-Description", "A basic toxicology and anti-venom kit to combat poisoning.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Antipoison-FlavorText", "It\'s speculated that exotics may suffuse much of the plant life in the terrazone, imparting bioactive properties, though exactly what these are, whether they\'re safe, and exactly how it works ... at this stage, who knows?")

Rows.Name: Item_Antiseptic
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Antiseptic-Description", "Heals food poisoning, infected wounds and bacterial infections like pneumonia.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Antiseptic-FlavorText", "Broad-spectrum, natural antibiotics that provide some ongoing protection against afflictions such as pnuemonia.")

Rows.Name: Item_Antiparasitic
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Antiparasitic-Description", "A powerful medical preparation for curing festering wounds.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Antiparasitic-FlavorText", "From suppurating wounds to dysentery, this natural broad-spectrum antibiotic remedy cures it all.")

Rows.Name: Item_Blood_Thinner
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Blood_Thinner-Description", "A folk remedy for concussions and contusions.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Blood_Thinner-FlavorText", "A very basic anticoagulant.")

Rows.Name: Item_Wood_Roof_Corner
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Wood_Roof_Corner-Description", "A roughly cut insert for angled roofs.")

Rows.Name: Item_Stone_Roof_Corner
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Stone_Roof_Corner-Description", "A robust insert for angled roofs.")

Rows.Name: Item_Concrete_Roof_Corner
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Concrete_Roof_Corner-Description", "A strong insert for angled roofs.")

Rows.Name: Item_Thatch_Roof_Corner
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Thatch_Roof_Corner-Description", "A lightweight insert for angled roofs.")

Rows.Name: Item_Iron_Roof_Corner
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Iron_Roof_Corner-Description", "A strong, lightweight insert for angled roofs.")

Rows.Name: Item_Glass_Roof_Corner
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Glass_Roof_Corner-Description", "A transparent insert for angled roofs.")

Rows.Name: Item_FirePit
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_FirePit-Description", "A large, stone-lined pit for swift cooking and heating.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_FirePit-FlavorText", "Flashroast a steak or an entire mammoth forequarter.")

Rows.Name: Item_Carcass_Pronghorn
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_Pronghorn-Description", "A herd animal, able to endure the extremes of Icarus\'s environment.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_Pronghorn-FlavorText", "The pronghorn variant thrives on the sparse, desert terrain in which this region of Icarus now abounds.")

Rows.Name: Item_Dehumidifier
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Dehumidifier-Description", "Powerful, portable protection against the effects of being underground.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Dehumidifier-FlavorText", "Powered by charcoal, the dehumidifier heavily reduces bacterial growth in caves by reducing dampness.")

Rows.Name: Item_Player_Sleeping
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Player_Sleeping-Description", "Merely sleeping.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Player_Sleeping-FlavorText", "Passing the dark of night, restoring for the day to come.")

Rows.Name: Item_Carcass_Conifer_Wolf
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_Conifer_Wolf-Description", "A savage pack hunter.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_Conifer_Wolf-FlavorText", "A genetic variant of the grey wolf, this efficient carnivore is an indiscriminate hunter, thriving in the transplanted forests of Icarus.")

Rows.Name: Item_Portable_Beacon
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Portable_Beacon-Description", "Displays a map marker when deployed. Prospectors can adjust the map markers icon and colour by interacting with it.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Portable_Beacon-FlavorText", "Absorbs the smallest amount of light from any atmosphere and stores it in a small internal battery that can last for hundreds of years with minial charge. The beacon offers a BYO solution.")

Rows.Name: Item_Crushed_Bone
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Crushed_Bone-Description", "A calcium-rich powder.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Crushed_Bone-FlavorText", "Highly ground bone creates a useful ingredient for a range of concoctions.")

Rows.Name: Item_Glassworking_Bench
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Glassworking_Bench-Description", "Tools for creating glass items and construction elements.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Glassworking_Bench-FlavorText", "True glass-making originated in the Indus Valley in 1700 BCE, passing into the Mediterranean, then Africa and the rest of the world, before extending through space to Icarus in the mid 22nd century.")

Rows.Name: Item_Glassworking_Bench_V2
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Glassworking_Bench_V2-Description", "Tools for creating glass items and construction elements.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Glassworking_Bench_V2-FlavorText", "True glass-making originated in the Indus Valley in 1700 BCE, passing into the Mediterranean, then Africa and the rest of the world, before extending through space to Icarus in the mid 22nd century.")

Rows.Name: Item_Leather_Curtain_Door
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Leather_Curtain_Door-Description", "A heavily curtained doorway.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Leather_Curtain_Door-FlavorText", "A door for those unimpressed by hinges and handles.")

Rows.Name: Item_Carcass_Mammoth_Boss
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_Mammoth_Boss-Description", "A behemoth from prehistory.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_Mammoth_Boss-FlavorText", "In the aftermath of failed terraforming, this mammoth variant (Mammuthia Icaria) was released illicitly by a disillusioned geneticist. It found an unexpected home in the newly arctified snowfields of Icarus.")

Rows.Name: Item_Kitchen_Bench
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Kitchen_Bench-Description", "A modular workspace for cooking and concocting complex recipes.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Kitchen_Bench-FlavorText", "Prep advanced food recipes here to assist on your adventures")

Rows.Name: Item_Kitchen_Stove
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Kitchen_Stove-Description", "An efficient, biofuel-powered cooking unit.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Kitchen_Stove-FlavorText", "A well-crafted, solidly insulated stove for discerning off-world chefs.")

Rows.Name: Item_Kitchen_Storage
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Kitchen_Storage-Description", "A compact module for all your kitchen storage needs.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Kitchen_Storage-FlavorText", "For the demanding Icarus ingredient hoarder, a small module with 40 storage slots.")

Rows.Name: Item_Carcass_SnowLeopard
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_SnowLeopard-Description", "An exotic, evasive predator of the ice.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_SnowLeopard-FlavorText", "\"We nod, grimace, and resume our paths to separate destinies and graves.\" - Peter Matthiessen, The Snow Leopard")

Rows.Name: Item_Carcass_SnowLeopard_Alpha
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_SnowLeopard_Alpha-Description", "An exotic, evasive predator of the ice.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_SnowLeopard_Alpha-FlavorText", "\"We nod, grimace, and resume our paths to separate destinies and graves.\" - Peter Matthiessen, The Snow Leopard")

Rows.Name: Item_Mammoth_Tusk
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Mammoth_Tusk-Description", "A fortune in ivory from a titan reborn; a small step towards revealing Icarus\'s secrets.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Mammoth_Tusk-FlavorText", "Theories suggest that when exotic material present in plant life is ingested, it affects cellular reproduction in animals. The exact mechanism is unclear, with speculation that some varieties of exotics possess negative mass, producing relativistic micro-effects. Analysis of this specimen will reveal more.")

Rows.Name: Item_Bone_Sickle
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Bone_Sickle-Description", "Repurposed remains for easy reaping.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Bone_Sickle-FlavorText", "The falk or grasshook is a harvesting tool of old, a symbol of labor, and weapon of disgruntled serfdom.")

Rows.Name: Item_Glass_Jar
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Glass_Jar-Description", "A roughly made, but perfectly serviceable mason jar.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Glass_Jar-FlavorText", "This jar is empty, but like the many gaps in our understanding of this planet, is waiting to be filled.")

Rows.Name: Item_Glass_Jar_Jam
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Glass_Jar_Jam-Description", "Slightly bitter, but unsurpassed.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Glass_Jar_Jam-FlavorText", "It\'s not just jam. You hold in your hand an irreducible symbol of humanity\'s commitment to settling an alien world. Strongly increases max stamina.")

Rows.Name: Item_Polarbear_Pelt
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Polarbear_Pelt-Description", "A fur hide from the largest known carnivore on two planets.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Polarbear_Pelt-FlavorText", "An unparalleled hunter, able to smell its prey from over a mile away, the polar bear has only one natural enemy: you.")

Rows.Name: Item_Polarbear_Head_Armor
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Polarbear_Head_Armor-Description", "Lightweight, highly insulated head protection.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Polarbear_Head_Armor-FlavorText", "Once a warm high altitude desert, the arctic\'s temperature dropped in the aftermath of failed terraforming, leaving a frigid wasteland of which the polar bear is now the unchallenged apex predator.")

Rows.Name: Item_Polarbear_Chest
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Polarbear_Chest-Description", "Strong, lightweight body armor with extreme protection against cold.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Polarbear_Chest-FlavorText", "Evolved for the most demanding climate on Earth, the polar bear\'s skin works equally well in the most damaged environment on Icarus.")

Rows.Name: Item_Polarbear_Arms
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Polarbear_Arms-Description", "Tough and lightweight fur gloves offering extreme protection against low temperatures.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Polarbear_Arms-FlavorText", "Skinning polar bears has been illegal to everyone except Inuit hunters for centuries on Earth. On Icarus, there is no such prohibition.")

Rows.Name: Item_Polarbear_Legs
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Polarbear_Legs-Description", "Lightweight fur armor for the lower body, offering exceptional insulation.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Polarbear_Legs-FlavorText", "Once a warm high altitude desert, the arctic\'s temperature dropped in the aftermath of failed terraforming, leaving a frigid wasteland of which the polar bear is now the unchallenged apex predator.")

Rows.Name: Item_Polarbear_Feet
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Polarbear_Feet-Description", "Highly insulated, lightweight protective fur boots.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Polarbear_Feet-FlavorText", "Evolved for the most demanding climate on Earth, the polar bear\'s skin works equally well in the most damaged environment on Icarus.")

Rows.Name: Item_Iron_Nail
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Iron_Nail-Description", "An inter-fibrous friction fastener.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Iron_Nail-FlavorText", "A nail works in two directions: through friction in the axial direction, and shear strength laterally.")

Rows.Name: Item_Copper_Nail
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Copper_Nail-Description", "Lightweight copper fastener.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Copper_Nail-FlavorText", "Easily wrought, easily bent.")

Rows.Name: Item_Steel_Screw
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Steel_Screw-Description", "Heavy-duty, highly durable fasteners.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Steel_Screw-FlavorText", "Humanity\'s 43rd greatest invention.")

Rows.Name: Item_Iron_Hammer
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Iron_Hammer-Description", "Maintain structures against the wrath of Icarus.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Iron_Hammer-FlavorText", "Counter the forces of nature with a little violence of your own.")

Rows.Name: Item_Meta_Hammer_Printed
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Hammer_Printed-Description", "A 3D printed repair hammer.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Hammer_Printed-FlavorText", "Counter the forces of nature with a little violence of your own.")

Rows.Name: Item_Steel_Hammer
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Steel_Hammer-Description", "The most efficient tool for repairing damaged structures.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Steel_Hammer-FlavorText", "The tidal forces of Minos produce exceptionally violent weather on Icarus, its largest moon, which in turn damages even the most robust construction. A steel hammer can even the odds ... a little.")

Rows.Name: Faction_Satellite
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Faction_Satellite-Description", "A downed and damaged Inaris orbital terraforming unit.")

Rows.Name: Item_Steel_Rebar
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Steel_Rebar-Description", "Heavy, ribbed steel wire for reinforcing concrete.")

Rows.Name: Item_Platinum_Bolt
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Platinum_Bolt-Description", "Hard-hitting, if not priceless.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Platinum_Bolt-FlavorText", "Though eclipsed by exotics, platinum remains extremely valuable, even if the market is somewhat distant.")

Rows.Name: Item_Titanium_Bolt
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Titanium_Bolt-Description", "A high-damage projectile.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Titanium_Bolt-FlavorText", "\"When you\'ve got two tons of polar bear lumbering towards you across the ice, you suddenly realise a bullet\'s not going to cut it. But a titanium bolt through the eye, that\'s another story.\" - Sol Berlinski")

Rows.Name: Item_Carcass_Snow_Rabbit
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_Snow_Rabbit-Description", "As on Earth, a survivor, but not today.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_Snow_Rabbit-FlavorText", "As reproductively prodigious, even in the harshest environments of Icarus, as it was on earth.")

Rows.Name: Item_Carcass_Rabbit
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_Rabbit-Description", "As on Earth, a survivor, but not today.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_Rabbit-FlavorText", "The rabbit variant has found a new niche on this malformed environment.")

Rows.Name: Item_Carcass_Jaguar_Black
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_Jaguar_Black-Description", "A sleekly effective killer.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_Jaguar_Black-FlavorText", "Introduced to manage the population of smaller mammals, the jaguar variant adopted swiftly to the arid regions of the new Icarus.")

Rows.Name: Item_Rifle_BoltAction
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Rifle_BoltAction-Description", "A single-shot bolt action, packs a punch.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Rifle_BoltAction-FlavorText", "Despite limited metallurgic and gunsmithing resources, First Cohort prospectors have managed to design a better-than-serviceable, true-aiming hunting rifle.")

Rows.Name: Item_Bio_Needle
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Bio_Needle-Description", "Terraforming tool or catastrophic bio-weapon, you decide.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Bio_Needle-FlavorText", "Responsible for the so-called \'genocide\' of Icarus\'s native life in the terrazone, each \'warhead\' contains sufficient enzymatic material to \'adjust\' a trillion tons of atmosphere. Handle with care.")

Rows.Name: Item_Splint
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Splint-Description", "Speeds the healing of a broken leg.")

Rows.Name: Item_Antibiotic_Paste
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Antibiotic_Paste-Description", "Reduces the effects of food poisoning, and other low grade infections.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Antibiotic_Paste-FlavorText", "A natural antibacterial agent that diminishes the impact of afflictions such as infected wounds and pnuemonia.")

Rows.Name: Item_Antiparasitic_Paste
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Antiparasitic_Paste-Description", "A medical preparation for reducing the effects of festering wounds.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Antiparasitic_Paste-FlavorText", "From the very first, newcomers to Icarus noted the medicinal and bioactive properties of Earth-type plants were significantly more intense.")

Rows.Name: Item_Antipoison_Paste
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Antipoison_Paste-Description", "A basic toxicology and anti-venom kit to reduce the effects of poisoning.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Antipoison_Paste-FlavorText", "It\'s speculated that exotics may suffuse much of the plant life in the terrazone, imparting bioactive properties, though exactly what these are, whether they\'re safe, and exactly how it works ... at this stage, who knows?")

Rows.Name: Item_Blood_Thinning_Paste
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Blood_Thinning_Paste-Description", "A folk remedy for diminishing the effects of concussions and contusions.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Blood_Thinning_Paste-FlavorText", "A very basic anticoagulant.")

Rows.Name: Item_Antibiotic_Tonic
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Antibiotic_Tonic-Description", "An antibacterial distillation that cures food poisoning, wound infections and afflictions like pneumonia.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Antibiotic_Tonic-FlavorText", "The interaction between bioactive substances and microbial life here on Icarus is still poorly understood, especially when one factors in the effects of exotic matter to both.")

Rows.Name: Item_Antiparasitic_Tonic
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Antiparasitic_Tonic-Description", "A medicinal preparation for curing festering wounds.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Antiparasitic_Tonic-FlavorText", "From suppurating wounds to dysentery, this natural broad-spectrum antibiotic remedy cures it all.")

Rows.Name: Item_Antipoison_Tonic
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Antipoison_Tonic-Description", "Fast-working anti-venom to combat poisoning.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Antipoison_Tonic-FlavorText", "Of the many ways to die on Icarus, poisoning is perhaps the least glorious.")

Rows.Name: Item_Blood_Thinning_Tonic
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Blood_Thinning_Tonic-Description", "An effective remedy for relieving concussions and contusions.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Blood_Thinning_Tonic-FlavorText", "Voyagers to Icarus have found themselves forced to ressurect a range of folk treatments and traditional medicines.")

Rows.Name: Item_Antibiotic_Pill
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Antibiotic_Pill-Description", "A broad-spectrum antibacterial agent, protecting against food poisoning, wound infections and pneumonia.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Antibiotic_Pill-FlavorText", "While not quite invincible, your susceptibility to microbial takeover will temporarily reach an all-time low.")

Rows.Name: Item_Antiparastic_Pill
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Antiparastic_Pill-Description", "A potent antibacterial preparation for preventing festering wounds.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Antiparastic_Pill-FlavorText", "Flooding your body with antibiotics is a double-edged sword, but if it stops you needing to use the word \'festering\' to describe part of your body, it\'s worth it.")

Rows.Name: Item_Antipoison_Pill
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Antipoison_Pill-Description", "An long-acting anti-venom to prevent poisoning.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Antipoison_Pill-FlavorText", "Ingest and ignore the risks.")

Rows.Name: Item_Blood_Thinning_Pill
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Blood_Thinning_Pill-Description", "A potent preventative for concussions and contusions.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Blood_Thinning_Pill-FlavorText", "Off-label and off-planet, this one doesn\'t come with any warnings. So it\'s probably safe.")

Rows.Name: Item_Platinum_Spear
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Platinum_Spear-Description", "Priceless on Earth. An advanced survival tool on Icarus.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Platinum_Spear-FlavorText", "A midweight, short-shafted ahlspeiss spear that, composition aside, would not have looked out of place in 16th century Prussia.")

Rows.Name: Item_Faction_Mission_Drill
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Faction_Mission_Drill-Description", "A portable, heavy duty boring rig powered by biofuel.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Faction_Mission_Drill-FlavorText", "Driven by bio-diesel, this micro-derrick design was adapted from asteroid mining equipment used in the early 22nd century.")

Rows.Name: Item_Platinum_Knife
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Platinum_Knife-Description", "A precision blade, stronger than steel.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Platinum_Knife-FlavorText", "Platinum\'s durablity gives an incredibly accurate, lethal cutting edge.")

Rows.Name: Item_Sandworm_Scale
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Sandworm_Scale-Description", "A titan\'s cast-off armor.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Sandworm_Scale-FlavorText", "When held in the hand, fresh from the worm\'s body, the scale gently vibrated. Slowly, this motion drained away, leaving only a flake of light, hugely strong armor.")

Rows.Name: Item_Platinum_Sickle
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Platinum_Sickle-Description", "An extremely precise, high yield harvesting tool.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Platinum_Sickle-FlavorText", "A proletariat icon made from a near-priceless material, yet no more valuable than lead when compared to exotics themselves.")

Rows.Name: Item_Platinum_Hammer
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Platinum_Hammer-Description", "Light, durable, accurate, but still a hammer.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Platinum_Hammer-FlavorText", "\"On Icarus, you\'re either the hammer, or the anvil\" - Javier Survez")

Rows.Name: Item_Titanium_Hammer
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Titanium_Hammer-Description", "A durable and reliable tool for structure repair.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Titanium_Hammer-FlavorText", "Counter the forces of nature with a little violence of your own.")

Rows.Name: Item_Platinum_Axe
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Platinum_Axe-Description", "An axceedingly reliable, accurate hewing tool.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Platinum_Axe-FlavorText", "\"Give me six hours to chop down a tree, I\'ll spend the first four sharpening the axe\" - A. Lincoln")

Rows.Name: Item_Platinum_Pickaxe
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Platinum_Pickaxe-Description", "Strong, high-yield and extremely accurate.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Platinum_Pickaxe-FlavorText", "There is a small, but specific class of problems for which the only solution is a pickaxe.")

Rows.Name: Item_Leather_Curtain_Window
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Leather_Curtain_Window-Description", "Heavy duty leather curtains.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Leather_Curtain_Window-FlavorText", "Happier with flaps.")

Rows.Name: Item_Wood_Build_HalfPitch
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Wood_Build_HalfPitch-Description", "Combinable elements for creating 2:1 inclines.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Wood_Build_HalfPitch-FlavorText", "For the more discerning builder.")

Rows.Name: Item_Wood_Build_HalfNormal
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Wood_Build_HalfNormal-Description", "A kit of half-sized wooden building elements.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Wood_Build_HalfNormal-FlavorText", "Wood structures withstand light storms without damage. Can be repaired with a repair hammer.")

Rows.Name: Item_Sandworm_Knife
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Sandworm_Knife-Description", "A rare, highly durable blade.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Sandworm_Knife-FlavorText", "Evolved to resist prolonged sand abrasion, the sandworm\'s chitin-analogue scales holds an excellent edge.")

Rows.Name: Item_Sandworm_Spear
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Sandworm_Spear-Description", "A spear crafted from an ancient organism\'s armor.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Sandworm_Spear-FlavorText", "Group 15 continues to research sandworms, suspecting its subterranean evolution could hold clues to the bioeffects of exotics.")

Rows.Name: Item_Sandworm_Arrow
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Sandworm_Arrow-Description", "A rare and resilient projectile.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Sandworm_Arrow-FlavorText", "While the sandworm\'s existence inside the terrazone is a mystery, its scales make extraordinarily practical blades.")

Rows.Name: Item_Sandworm_Bow
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Sandworm_Bow-Description", "A bow fashioned from the stronger scales of a Sandworm.")

Rows.Name: Item_Caveworm_Knife
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Caveworm_Knife-Description", "A rare, highly durable blade.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Caveworm_Knife-FlavorText", "Evolved to resist prolonged sand abrasion, the worm\'s chitin-analogue scales holds an excellent edge.")

Rows.Name: Item_Caveworm_Spear
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Caveworm_Spear-Description", "A spear crafted from an ancient organism\'s armor.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Caveworm_Spear-FlavorText", "Many factions continue to research these worms, suspecting that subterranean evolution could hold clues to the bioeffects of exotics.")

Rows.Name: Item_Caveworm_Arrow
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Caveworm_Arrow-Description", "A rare and resilient projectile.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Caveworm_Arrow-FlavorText", "While the worms\' existence inside the terrazone is a mystery, their scales make extraordinarily practical blades")

Rows.Name: Item_Caveworm_Bow
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Caveworm_Bow-Description", "A hard-won trophy turned into a weapon ")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Caveworm_Bow-FlavorText", "Still smells a little strange though")

Rows.Name: Item_Concrete_Railing
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Concrete_Railing-Description", "Safety first.")

Rows.Name: Item_Iron_Railing
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Iron_Railing-Description", "Reduce risk, improve resale value.")

Rows.Name: Item_Reinforced_Railing
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Reinforced_Railing-Description", "Build a better balcony.")

Rows.Name: Item_Carcass_Pack_Wolf
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_Pack_Wolf-Description", "A once-savage hunter.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_Pack_Wolf-FlavorText", "A hyper-aggressive member of a genetically-altered wolf pack")

Rows.Name: Item_Tech_1
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Tech_1-Description", "Element from an experimental Larkwell Martinez device.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Tech_1-FlavorText", "Some sort of signal or force transmitter.")

Rows.Name: Item_Tech_2
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Tech_2-Description", "Element from an experimental Larkwell Martinez device.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Tech_2-FlavorText", "A generator of some kind.")

Rows.Name: Item_Tech_3
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Tech_3-Description", "Element from an experimental Larkwell Martinez device.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Tech_3-FlavorText", "A power control unit, possibly.")

Rows.Name: Item_TechRecombined
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_TechRecombined-Description", "Gravitation Shield Prototype")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_TechRecombined-FlavorText", "While the precise operation of this Larkwell Martinez prototype is confidential, general specifications suggest it uses the mass-distorting effects of exotic matter to generate a diametric field intended to dampen local gravitic influence.")

Rows.Name: Item_Survey_Radar
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Survey_Radar-Description", "A portable microwave GPR system with a laser networking feature.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Survey_Radar-FlavorText", "The original UDA terraformers used seismic surveys, but these provoked local fauna. Ground-penetrating radar has proven less antagonizing, though still not without risk.")

Rows.Name: Item_Survey_Transmitter
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Survey_Transmitter-Description", "A wideband, surface-to-orbit communication laser relay system.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Survey_Transmitter-FlavorText", "Inaris\'s laser uplink transmitter was originally commissioned by Uniao for off-world mining communications. The federation reputedly owns a majority share in the manufacturing company itself.")

Rows.Name: Item_Carcass_WildBoar
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_WildBoar-Description", "The remains of one of nature\'s most feral creations.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_WildBoar-FlavorText", "Extraordinarily hardy and adaptable, this suid has become a wide-ranging pest in its short time on Icarus.")

Rows.Name: Item_Carcass_Zebra
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_Zebra-Description", "A gregarious, migratory grazer and icon of the savannah.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_Zebra-FlavorText", "The exact purpose of zebra stripes remains a mystery.")

Rows.Name: Item_Meta_Ration
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Ration-Description", "Agrizero\'s finest synthetic food product")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Ration-FlavorText", "For those with more pressing concerns than what their food actually tastes like, Agrizero\'s MREs provide enduring sustenance.")

Rows.Name: Item_Meta_Super_Ration
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Super_Ration-Description", "Protein- and energy- boosted high-density food product.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Super_Ration-FlavorText", "Agrizero\'s \'Eat and forget\' campaign never truly hit home, suggesting the food was either immemorable or best wiped from one\'s memory. Regardless, the product provides a huge amount of nutrition in a small space.")

Rows.Name: Item_Meta_Soda
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Soda-Description", "Xigo\'s flagship lifestyle beverage.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Soda-FlavorText", "Humanity\'s favorite flavor.")

Rows.Name: Item_Meta_Oxygen_Gel
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Oxygen_Gel-Description", "Agrizero\'s patented gel supplement lowers the heart rate, reducing oxygen consumption.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Oxygen_Gel-FlavorText", "Largely illegal on Earth, indispensible among the stars.")

Rows.Name: Item_Meta_Stamina_Gel
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Stamina_Gel-Description", "A blend of natural ingredients and highly synthetic stimulants that temporarily slows stamina loss.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Stamina_Gel-FlavorText", "Don\'t ask, just take.")

Rows.Name: Item_Thatch_Halfpiece
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Thatch_Halfpiece-Description", "Half- and quarter-sized building elements for detailed construction work.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Thatch_Halfpiece-FlavorText", "These sets are useful for creating walkways, balconies, trims and a range of other smaller constructions.")

Rows.Name: Item_Wood_Halfpiece
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Wood_Halfpiece-Description", "Half- and quarter-sized building elements for detailed construction work.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Wood_Halfpiece-FlavorText", "These sets are useful for creating walkways, balconies, trims and a range of other smaller constructions.")

Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Stone_Halfpiece-FlavorText", "These sets are useful for creating walkways, balconies, trims and a range of other smaller constructions.")

Rows.Name: Item_Refined_Halfpiece
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Refined_Halfpiece-Description", "Half- and quarter-sized building elements for detailed construction work.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Refined_Halfpiece-FlavorText", "These sets are useful for creating walkways, balconies, trims and a range of other smaller constructions.")

Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Glass_Halfpiece-FlavorText", "These sets are useful for creating walkways, balconies, trims and a range of other smaller constructions.")
