Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Advanced_Armor_Bench-FlavorText", "With the ability to weave platinum into fiber and cure leather on a drying rack prospectors can craft tougher outfits for the harsh environment of Icarus.")

Rows.Name: Item_Advanced_Leather
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Advanced_Leather-Description", "Treated leather for a more durable prospector protection solution.")

Rows.Name: Item_Platinum_Weave
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Platinum_Weave-Description", "Platinum strands interwoven with a fiber based fabric.")

Rows.Name: Item_Advanced_Cloth_Head
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Advanced_Cloth_Head-Description", "Light and breathable, designed for long journeys through the harsh sands of Icarus.")

Rows.Name: Item_Advanced_Cloth_Chest
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Advanced_Cloth_Chest-Description", "Light and breathable, designed for long journeys through the harsh sands of Icarus.")

Rows.Name: Item_Advanced_Cloth_Arms
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Advanced_Cloth_Arms-Description", "Light and breathable, designed for long journeys through the harsh sands of Icarus.")

Rows.Name: Item_Advanced_Cloth_Legs
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Advanced_Cloth_Legs-Description", "Light and breathable, designed for long journeys through the harsh sands of Icarus.")

Rows.Name: Item_Advanced_Cloth_Feet
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Advanced_Cloth_Feet-Description", "Light and breathable, designed for long journeys through the harsh sands of Icarus.")

Rows.Name: Item_Animal_Bed
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Animal_Bed-Description", "Juvenile animals can use this as a designated sleeping spot")

Rows.Name: Item_Spotlight_Tripod
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Spotlight_Tripod-Description", "A high intensity spotlight mounted to a tripod stand")

Rows.Name: Item_Super_Cooled_Ice
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Super_Cooled_Ice-Description", "A volatile substance that can cause frostbite in seconds.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Super_Cooled_Ice-FlavorText", "Handle with care.")

Rows.Name: Item_Shield_Wooden
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Shield_Wooden-Description", "A rudimentary shield that can be used to block incoming attacks.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Shield_Wooden-FlavorText", "Simple, but effective.")

Rows.Name: Item_Mission_Communicator_T2
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Mission_Communicator_T2-Description", "Interact to Receive a Mission From \'SMPL3\' - Simplified Mission Prospector Liaison V3")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Mission_Communicator_T2-FlavorText", "Replacing UDA agents one mission at a time.")

Rows.Name: Item_Saddle_Standard_Bag
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Saddle_Standard_Bag-Description", "Place this harness inside a tamed Buffalo\'s inventory to increase it\'s carrying capacity. This harness cannot be used as a seat by players.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Saddle_Standard_Bag-FlavorText", "Lending a helping hand, or hoof.")

Rows.Name: Item_Carcass_Moa_Juvenile
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_Moa_Juvenile-Description", "A juvenile Moa which never quite made it to full adulthood.")

Rows.Name: Item_Carcass_Buffalo_Juvenile
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_Buffalo_Juvenile-Description", "A juvenile Buffalo which never quite made it to full adulthood.")

Rows.Name: Item_Water_Trough
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Water_Trough-Description", "A simple, fillable trough to provide water for tamed creatures. Use a water container to fill, or let nature do its thing when it rains.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Water_Trough-FlavorText", "Hydration is key.")

Rows.Name: Item_Advanced_Leather_Process
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Advanced_Leather_Process-Description", "Treated leather in the process of drying.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Advanced_Leather_Process-FlavorText", "Given time this leather will be able to be put to good use.")

Rows.Name: Item_Mission_Flora_Biomatter_Sample
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Mission_Flora_Biomatter_Sample-Description", "A sample taken from a poisonous plant")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Mission_Flora_Biomatter_Sample-FlavorText", "Doesn\'t look safe.")

Rows.Name: Item_Mission_Digested_Biomatter_Sample
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Mission_Digested_Biomatter_Sample-Description", "A sample taken from a contaminated bear.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Mission_Digested_Biomatter_Sample-FlavorText", "Its essentially some kind of Acid")

Rows.Name: Item_Mission_Damaged_Bioweapon_Sample
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Mission_Damaged_Bioweapon_Sample-Description", "A damaged bio-weapon, it seems to be leaking.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Mission_Damaged_Bioweapon_Sample-FlavorText", "Probably get rid of this ASAP")

Rows.Name: Item_Carcass_Bear_Contaminated
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_Bear_Contaminated-Description", "Poor creature seems to be contaminated by some toxin.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_Bear_Contaminated-FlavorText", "Within the zone of failed terraforming, little can challenge the grizzly variant as an apex predator. Outside the zone, however, is another matter.")

Rows.Name: Item_Wood_Railing_Gate
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Wood_Railing_Gate-Description", "A rough, but serviceable wooden railing with a gate.")

Rows.Name: Item_Fortification_Wood_Wall
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Fortification_Wood_Wall-Description", "A large, strong wood wall fortification.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Fortification_Wood_Wall-FlavorText", "Claim your territory through the wonders of construction.")

Rows.Name: Item_Fortification_Wood_Spikes
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Fortification_Wood_Spikes-Description", "A large collection of spiked defenses which can be mounted to fortification walls.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Fortification_Wood_Spikes-FlavorText", "An extra layer of defense, prevents wildlife from working their way through your walls. ")

Rows.Name: Item_Fortification_Wood_Gate
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Fortification_Wood_Gate-Description", "A large, strong wood gate fortification which can be opened and closed.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Fortification_Wood_Gate-FlavorText", "From safety to wilderness, an entryway to the danger of Icarus.")

Rows.Name: Item_Fortification_Wood_Walkway
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Fortification_Wood_Walkway-Description", "A walkway and ramp set for the wood fortification walls.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Fortification_Wood_Walkway-FlavorText", "A protected vantage point to survey the nearby area.")

Rows.Name: Item_Exotic_Delivery_Interface
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Exotic_Delivery_Interface-Description", "Allows you to order a Delivery Pod for Exotic Retrieval")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Exotic_Delivery_Interface-FlavorText", "Part of the Icarus Orbital Exchange System developed by Sinotai.")

Rows.Name: Item_Carcass_BatDog
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_BatDog-Description", "A hideous mutant now at peace.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_BatDog-FlavorText", "Though sympathy can\'t alter facts, it can help to make them more bearable. This creature deserves sympathy.")

Rows.Name: Item_Mission_Communication_Blueprint_T2
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Mission_Communication_Blueprint_T2-Description", "A USB drive with the plans for an Upgraded Communication Device")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Mission_Communication_Blueprint_T2-FlavorText", "Once downloaded to the suit, there is no need for this item.")

Rows.Name: Item_Carcass_Needler
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_Needler-Description", "Genetically divergent reptile.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_Needler-FlavorText", "Bone-like spines push through the scales of this mutated reptile. This animal led a pain filled existence.")

Rows.Name: Item_Mission_AudioLog_Prometheus_1
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Mission_AudioLog_Prometheus_1-Description", "A Strange Audio log taken from a prospectors suit.")

Rows.Name: Item_Mission_AudioLog_Prometheus_2
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Mission_AudioLog_Prometheus_2-Description", "A Strange Audio log taken from a prospectors suit.")

Rows.Name: Item_Carcass_Deer_Var
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_Deer_Var-Description", "Muscular corpse of a deer-like creature. ")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_Deer_Var-FlavorText", "Icarus is a microcosm of evolutionary extremes. Such pressures cause somewhat rapid and acute adaptation. The Equix for example, has twice the musculature at roughly twice the density compared to Earth cervidae. ")

Rows.Name: Item_Stone_Throwing_Knife
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Stone_Throwing_Knife-Description", "A basic, balanced blade for taking down foes at medium distances.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Stone_Throwing_Knife-FlavorText", "Icarus\'s unusually active tectonics provide a ready source of sedimentary rocks, making for easily knapped, sharp, but weak blades.")

Rows.Name: Item_Bone_Throwing_Knife
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Bone_Throwing_Knife-Description", "Stronger, lighter and sharper than its stone cousin. ")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Bone_Throwing_Knife-FlavorText", "Did any UDA xenobiologist ever foresee that the bones of animals they adapted for life on Icarus would one day be used to fashion rudimentary hunting weapons?")

Rows.Name: Item_Metal_Throwing_Knife
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Metal_Throwing_Knife-Description", "A short, clip-point blade for better defense and swifter skinning.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Metal_Throwing_Knife-FlavorText", "\'A mind all logic is like a knife all blade. It makes the hand bleed that uses it.\' -- Rabindranath Tagore")

Rows.Name: Item_Titanium_Throwing_Knife
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Titanium_Throwing_Knife-Description", "A blade as hard and lightweight as life itself.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Titanium_Throwing_Knife-FlavorText", "Named for the Greek Titans, titanium is harder than steel, corrosion resistant and extremely light. Its only flaw is brittleness, meaning it falls short of its indestructible reputation.")

Rows.Name: Item_Steel_Throwing_Knife
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Steel_Throwing_Knife-Description", "A tempered needlepoint hunting blade.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Steel_Throwing_Knife-FlavorText", "Finely balanced knives like this can be thrown accurately with a little practice.")

Rows.Name: Item_Platinum_Throwing_Knife
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Platinum_Throwing_Knife-Description", "A precision blade, stronger than steel.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Platinum_Throwing_Knife-FlavorText", "Platinum\'s durablity gives an incredibly accurate, lethal cutting edge.")

Rows.Name: Item_Sandworm_Throwing_Knife
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Sandworm_Throwing_Knife-Description", "A rare, highly durable blade.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Sandworm_Throwing_Knife-FlavorText", "Evolved to resist prolonged sand abrasion, the sandworm\'s chitin-analogue scales holds an excellent edge.")

Rows.Name: Item_Caveworm_Throwing_Knife
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Caveworm_Throwing_Knife-Description", "A rare, highly durable blade.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Caveworm_Throwing_Knife-FlavorText", "Evolved to resist prolonged sand abrasion, the worm\'s chitin-analogue scales holds an excellent edge.")

Rows.Name: Item_Black_Wolf_Throwing_Knife
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Black_Wolf_Throwing_Knife-Description", "A knife made from the teeth of an intimidating predator.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Black_Wolf_Throwing_Knife-FlavorText", "Sharp as ever.")

Rows.Name: Item_Wood_Throwing_Spear
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Wood_Throwing_Spear-Description", "Simple to make, easy to break.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Wood_Throwing_Spear-FlavorText", "An effective defensive weapon, and erratic low range projectile, rapidly surpassed by improved versions.")

Rows.Name: Item_Bone_Throwing_Spear
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Bone_Throwing_Spear-Description", "A bone blade improves ranged damage.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Bone_Throwing_Spear-FlavorText", "As most new arrivals on Icarus realise at some stage, there is a certain elegance to hunting an animal for its bones, in order to craft a more effective weapon to hunt further animals.")

Rows.Name: Item_Metal_Throwing_Spear
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Metal_Throwing_Spear-Description", "An iron spearhead, improving defensive power and range.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Metal_Throwing_Spear-FlavorText", "\'I throw a spear into the darkness. That is intuition. Then I must send an army into the darkness to find the spear. That is intellect.\' -- Ingmar Bergman")

Rows.Name: Item_Steel_Throwing_Spear
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Steel_Throwing_Spear-Description", "A light, strong traditional spear design that holds its edge.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Steel_Throwing_Spear-FlavorText", "The word \'spear\' has descended to us through the ages largely unchanged.")

Rows.Name: Item_Titanium_Throwing_Spear
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Titanium_Throwing_Spear-Description", "A powerful, precise projectile weapon. ")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Titanium_Throwing_Spear-FlavorText", "Extremely strong and lightweight, the titanium spear is a devastating hunting and protective tool in well-trained hands.")

Rows.Name: Item_Platinum_Throwing_Spear
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Platinum_Throwing_Spear-Description", "Priceless on Earth. A projectile on Icarus.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Platinum_Throwing_Spear-FlavorText", "A midweight, short-shafted ahlspeiss spear that, composition aside, would not have looked out of place in 16th century Prussia.")

Rows.Name: Item_Carbon_Throwing_Spear
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carbon_Throwing_Spear-Description", "A light, resilient spear made of layered carbon fiber.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carbon_Throwing_Spear-FlavorText", "Kills faster, flies further.")

Rows.Name: Item_Composite_Throwing_Spear
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Composite_Throwing_Spear-Description", "Low weight, high strength, extreme damage.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Composite_Throwing_Spear-FlavorText", "Bringing two thousand years of materials technology to a sharp stick, the composite spear is lethal at long range or close quarters.")

Rows.Name: Item_Sandworm_Throwing_Spear
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Sandworm_Throwing_Spear-Description", "A spear crafted from an ancient organism\'s armor.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Sandworm_Throwing_Spear-FlavorText", "Group 15 continues to research sandworms, suspecting its subterranean evolution could hold clues to the bioeffects of exotics.")

Rows.Name: Item_Caveworm_Throwing_Spear
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Caveworm_Throwing_Spear-Description", "A spear crafted from an ancient organism\'s armor.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Caveworm_Throwing_Spear-FlavorText", "Many factions continue to research these worms, suspecting that subterranean evolution could hold clues to the bioeffects of exotics.")

Rows.Name: Item_Carcass_Swamp_Quad
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_Swamp_Quad-Description", "The Stryder evolved to run. This one did not run fast enough.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_Swamp_Quad-FlavorText", "A snail, turtle and crab walked into a bar. Something obscene occurred, and we got the Stryder. Do you think it... tastes like crab?")

Rows.Name: Item_Carcass_SwampBird
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_SwampBird-Description", "The body of a large flightless bird. Its bone-like face makes a natural death mask.")

Rows.Name: Item_Platinum_Crossbow
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Platinum_Crossbow-Description", "A crossbow that automatically reloads for rapid fire.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Platinum_Crossbow-FlavorText", "It\'s time for some serious damage.")

Rows.Name: Item_Titanium_Crossbow
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Titanium_Crossbow-Description", "A powerful weapon to help you tackle whatever Icarus throws at you.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Titanium_Crossbow-FlavorText", "Classier than a gun, more exciting than a bow.")

Rows.Name: Item_Carcass_Chamois_Var
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_Chamois_Var-Description", "Similar to a Chamois. This animal shows signs of subtle mutation.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_Chamois_Var-FlavorText", "Engineered from the Capra family of goats on Earth. Known to be less graceful than their Earth counterparts.")

Rows.Name: Item_Carcass_BlueBack
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_BlueBack-Description", "What the Blueback lacks in speed, it makes up for in bulk.")

Rows.Name: Item_Carcass_Roat_Swamp
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_Roat_Swamp-Description", "A dead specimen of local wildlife.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_Roat_Swamp-FlavorText", "One of the rare endemic lifeforms able to survive in the failed terraforming zone, the roat endured the savage shift in Icarus\'s climate, due to its uniquely flexible respiratory system.")

Rows.Name: Item_Carcass_BlueBack_Lava
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_BlueBack_Lava-Description", "The corpse of a sometimes gentle giant.")

Rows.Name: Item_Carcass_Daisy
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_Daisy-Description", "The decaying remains of the Blueback known as Daisy")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_Daisy-FlavorText", "Poor Creature")

Rows.Name: Item_ProspectorID
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_ProspectorID-Description", "The Standard ID of a Prospector Issued by the UDA")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_ProspectorID-FlavorText", "DO NOT LOSE")

Rows.Name: Item_Carcass_PredatorBird
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_PredatorBird-Description", "An endemic ambush predator torn from the skies.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_PredatorBird-FlavorText", "These intelligent flying reptiles are particular about their hunting opportunities. Often choosing targets that are weak or unaware. Mostly found scavenging an easy meal from a recent corpse.")

Rows.Name: Item_Shepherds_Pie
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Shepherds_Pie-Description", "An all rounder, this will keep you going.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Shepherds_Pie-FlavorText", "A hearty meal.")

Rows.Name: Item_Cooked_Soy_Bean
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Cooked_Soy_Bean-Description", "Filling and healthy.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Cooked_Soy_Bean-FlavorText", "Boosts health and health regeneration.")

Rows.Name: Item_Carcass_Spider
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_Spider-Description", "An example of scientific overreach. ")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_Spider-FlavorText", "Most prospectors agree, seeding this creature on Icarus was a greater mistake than the failed terraforming. ")

Rows.Name: Item_Health_Enhancement_Tonic
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Health_Enhancement_Tonic-Description", "Providing a large amount of health and boosting maximum health and health regen for a short time.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Health_Enhancement_Tonic-FlavorText", "When it comes to survival, prospectors on Icarus try everything.")

Rows.Name: Item_Stamina_Enhancement_Tonic
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Stamina_Enhancement_Tonic-Description", "Providing a large amount of stamina and boosting maximum stamina and stamina regen for a short time.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Stamina_Enhancement_Tonic-FlavorText", "Like the energy drinks of old, sometimes you need a little pick me up.")

Rows.Name: Item_Sustenence_Enhancement_Tonic
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Sustenence_Enhancement_Tonic-Description", "Providing a large amount of food, water and oxygen, and reducing their consumption for a short time.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Sustenence_Enhancement_Tonic-FlavorText", "Perfect for the prospector on the go.")

Rows.Name: Item_Strength_Enhancement_Tonic
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Strength_Enhancement_Tonic-Description", "Provides a large boost to melee damage, throwing speed and physical resistance, for a short time.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Strength_Enhancement_Tonic-FlavorText", "For when you want to get up close and personal.")

Rows.Name: Item_Dynamic_Mission_Beacon
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Dynamic_Mission_Beacon-Description", "Displays a map marker when deployed.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Dynamic_Mission_Beacon-FlavorText", "Lightly mapped and largely unexplored, human markers on the surface of Icarus are few and far between. The beacon offers a BYO solution.")

Rows.Name: Item_Dropship_Grenade_T4
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Dropship_Grenade_T4-Description", "Once thrown if the landing area is determined to be valid, will call your dropship to your current location.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Dropship_Grenade_T4-FlavorText", "Made on planet with the materials at hand, lets hope it works.")

Rows.Name: Item_Dropship_Grenade_Workshop
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Dropship_Grenade_Workshop-Description", "Once thrown if the landing area is determined to be valid, will call your dropship to your current location.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Dropship_Grenade_Workshop-FlavorText", "Another amazing innovation thanks to Sinotai")

Rows.Name: Item_Saddle_Cart_Wood
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Saddle_Cart_Wood-Description", "Place this cart inside a tamed Buffalo\'s inventory to greatly increase its carrying capacity. This cart cannot be used as a seat by players.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Saddle_Cart_Wood-FlavorText", "Lending a helping hand, or hoof.")

Rows.Name: Item_Landmine
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Landmine-Description", "Place to Trigger and Arm.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Landmine-FlavorText", "Dangerous... Very Dangerous....")

Rows.Name: Item_Carcass_WoolyZebra
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_WoolyZebra-Description", "A gregarious, migratory grazer and icon of the savannah.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_WoolyZebra-FlavorText", "The exact purpose of zebra stripes remains a mystery.")

Rows.Name: Item_Fish_Chunks
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Fish_Chunks-Description", "A pile of roughly diced fish.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Fish_Chunks-FlavorText", "Not the most appetizing...")

Rows.Name: Item_Basic_Fishing_Rod
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Basic_Fishing_Rod-Description", "A basic fishing rod.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Basic_Fishing_Rod-FlavorText", "Gone Fishin\'")

Rows.Name: Item_Wooden_Fishing_Rod
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Wooden_Fishing_Rod-Description", "A sturdy fishing rod.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Wooden_Fishing_Rod-FlavorText", "Gone Fishin\'")

Rows.Name: Item_Refined_Wood_Fishing_Rod
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Refined_Wood_Fishing_Rod-Description", "A lightweight and reliable fishing rod.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Refined_Wood_Fishing_Rod-FlavorText", "Gone Fishin\'")

Rows.Name: Item_Basic_Fishing_Trap
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Basic_Fishing_Trap-Description", "A simple trap that can catch Basic Low Quality Fish")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Basic_Fishing_Trap-FlavorText", "Set and forget.")

Rows.Name: Item_Advanced_Fishing_Trap
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Advanced_Fishing_Trap-Description", "An advanced trap that can catch all types of fish.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Advanced_Fishing_Trap-FlavorText", "True ingenuity.")

Rows.Name: Item_Fishing_Bench
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Fishing_Bench-Description", "A place to craft Rods and Lures and to fillet Fish that you\'ve caught.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Fishing_Bench-FlavorText", "The stench of this bench...")

Rows.Name: Item_Fish_Wall_Mount
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Fish_Wall_Mount-Description", "You may display your favourite catch here for all to see.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Fish_Wall_Mount-FlavorText", "If only it could sing.")

Rows.Name: Item_Aquarium
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Aquarium-Description", "A handy fish tank for keeping your favourite finned friends around, powered by biofuel.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Aquarium-FlavorText", "Don\'t tap on the glass.")

Rows.Name: Item_Advanced_Aquarium
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Advanced_Aquarium-Description", "A very fancy fish tank for keeping your favourite finned friends around, must be connected to both power and water.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Advanced_Aquarium-FlavorText", "I repeat, do NOT tap on the glass.")

Rows.Name: Item_Large_Advanced_Aquarium
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Large_Advanced_Aquarium-Description", "A very fancy large fish tank for keeping your favourite finned friends around, must be connected to both power and water.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Large_Advanced_Aquarium-FlavorText", "The latest technology for storing your fish friends.")

Rows.Name: Item_Saltwater_Fish_Fillet
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Saltwater_Fish_Fillet-Description", "A neatly trimmed fillet ready for cooking.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Saltwater_Fish_Fillet-FlavorText", "Nicely done.")

Rows.Name: Item_Freshwater_Fish_Fillet
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Freshwater_Fish_Fillet-Description", "A neatly trimmed fillet ready for cooking.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Freshwater_Fish_Fillet-FlavorText", "Nicely done.")

Rows.Name: Item_Fiber_Fishing_Lure
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Fiber_Fishing_Lure-Description", "A basic lure carefully crafted out of fibre, to attract more fish.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Fiber_Fishing_Lure-FlavorText", "Surely you\'ll catch a big one with this in your kit.")

Rows.Name: Item_Thumper
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Thumper-Description", "Deploy and activate to unearth mineable ores. Replenishes mineable rocks in the surrounding area. ")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Thumper-FlavorText", "Sure hope this doesn\'t attract anything big...")

Rows.Name: Item_Salt
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Salt-Description", "A small pile of Salt, can be used on a salting station to preserve food.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Salt-FlavorText", "An essential mineral for adding flavour and preserving food.")

Rows.Name: Item_Salting_Station
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Salting_Station-Description", "Can be used to preserve food, using salt.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Salting_Station-FlavorText", "Simple but effective")

Rows.Name: Item_Deep_Freeze
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Deep_Freeze-Description", "A freezer that preserves food but amasses ice very slowly and uses a fairly large amount of power.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Deep_Freeze-FlavorText", "Energy efficiency is important on EVERY planet.")

Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Heated_Canteen_Larkwell-Description", "An advanced canteen that can be used to heat and store water at your desired temperature.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Heated_Canteen_Larkwell-FlavorText", "Because there\'s nothing better than a hot drink in the Arctic.")

Rows.Name: Item_Meta_Oxygen_Tank_Larkwell
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Oxygen_Tank_Larkwell-Description", "An advanced oxygen tank with brand-new filters to improve vigor and air quality planetside.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Oxygen_Tank_Larkwell-FlavorText", "A true breath of fresh air.")

Rows.Name: Item_Meta_Creature_Scanner
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Creature_Scanner-Description", "Bio-Entity Analysis and Scanning Technology. A handheld device that scans nearby creatures for analysis and locates weaknesses.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Meta_Creature_Scanner-FlavorText", "A beauty of a device that will make surviving Icarus that much easier.")

Rows.Name: Item_Carcass_Swamp_Slug
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_Swamp_Slug-Description", "Corpse of a giant slug, poisonous slime still drips off its lifeless body.")

Rows.Name: Item_Mission_Prototype_Printed_Crate
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Mission_Prototype_Printed_Crate-Description", "A 3D Printed Crate with an internal battery for keeping contents preserved.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Mission_Prototype_Printed_Crate-FlavorText", "Quicker than making your own")

Rows.Name: Item_Carcass_Rabbit_Variant
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_Rabbit_Variant-Description", "As on Earth, a survivor, but not today.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_Rabbit_Variant-FlavorText", "The rabbit variant has found a new niche on this malformed environment.")

Rows.Name: Item_Carcass_Broodling
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_Broodling-Description", "The spawn of a much larger creature.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Carcass_Broodling-FlavorText", "You really don\'t want to meet its parents.")

Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Seed-FlavorText", "You reap what you sow.")

Rows.Name: Item_Stone_Shovel
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Stone_Shovel-Description", "Can be used to dig dirt mounds on Dirt or Grass, or shovel snow off your roof.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Stone_Shovel-FlavorText", "Shift snow, or bury a friend.")

Rows.Name: Item_Dirt_Mound
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Dirt_Mound-Description", "A place to plant crops.  Fully-grown crops left too long will eventually wither and only provide spoiled plants.")

Rows.Name: Item_Seed_Bread
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Seed_Bread-Description", "Healthy, wholemeal seed bread. ")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Seed_Bread-FlavorText", "Better for you than white bread... doesn\'t taste quite as good.")

Rows.Name: Item_Seed_Cracker
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Seed_Cracker-Description", "A very dense crunchy snack.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Seed_Cracker-FlavorText", "This cracker resembles hardtack. Upholding the explorers tradition of terrible snack choices.")

Rows.Name: Item_Berry_Bar
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Berry_Bar-Description", "Full of energy for long hikes.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Berry_Bar-FlavorText", "Tastes much better than seed crackers.")

Rows.Name: Item_Animal_Feed
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Animal_Feed-Description", "Nutritionally dense animal feed.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Animal_Feed-FlavorText", "Seed feed to satiate your creatures needs.")

Rows.Name: Item_Seed_Oil
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Seed_Oil-Description", "Thick oil, extracted from seeds.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Seed_Oil-FlavorText", "An oil with many uses.")

Rows.Name: Item_Watering_Can
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Watering_Can-Description", "When used will water any crop plots or dirt mounds in a small area in front of you.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Watering_Can-FlavorText", "It\'s better to be a Prospector in a garden, than a Gardener in space.")

Rows.Name: Item_Anvil_Bench_T3
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Anvil_Bench_T3-Description", "A versatile forge powered by coal for crafting various weapons and tools.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Anvil_Bench_T3-FlavorText", "Try to keep all digits away from the anvil...")

Rows.Name: Item_Anvil_Bench_T4
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Anvil_Bench_T4-Description", "An impressive foundry powered by electricity for crafting various higher quality weapons and tools.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Anvil_Bench_T4-FlavorText", "The UDA states that it has been at least seven days since the last accident using this piece of equipment...")

Rows.Name: Item_Masonry_Bench_T3
Rows.Description: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Masonry_Bench_T3-Description", "A manual workspace for crafting simple building supplies, weapons, and tools.")
Rows.FlavorText: NSLOCTEXT("D_Itemable", "Item_Masonry_Bench_T3-FlavorText", "The skill and precision of a mason can never be replaced by machines...")
